name: python-react-dev
description: A starting point boilerplate full stack project built with Python, Flask, and Create-React-App.

scripts.test: yarn run clean:reports && yarn run test:server && yarn test:server:coverage && yarn run test:client
scripts.test:server: pipenv run coverage run --branch --source=./server/src --omit=*/tests/* -m unittest discover -s ./server/src/tests
scripts.start: if-env NODE_ENV=production && npm run start:prod || npm run dev:start
